english.segment1: You are falling, falling fast away. Broken pieces lost along the way. Lost along the way. Do you really want to stay?
english.segment2: Oh, thats how it goes. Thats how it goes. To feel lost and all alone. Let it all go, let it all go. Dont put your trust in all you know
english.segment3: There is hope for those who go astray. Those who seek the truth will find the way. But it feels the same. Do you really want to change?
english.segment4: You gotta walk up to that line. All you need is faith this time. All thats broken will just fade away
